headline: PagerDuty Appoints Chris Ferro as Chief Legal Officer
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, January 12, 2026--PagerDuty, Inc. (NYSE:PD), a leader in digital operations management, today announced that Chris Ferro has joined the company as Chief Legal Officer. Ferro will oversee all legal functions at PagerDuty, including corporate, compliance, employment and product matters, with a focus on advancing business objectives while mitigating legal and regulatory risk.

headline: Latest News In Digital Payment - Euronet Expands Through Strategic CrediaBank Partnership
summary: Euronet Worldwide, Inc. has entered into a strategic partnership agreement with Greece's CrediaBank to acquire its merchant acquiring business, signaling significant developments in the digital payment sector. This transaction, anticipated to close in the third quarter of 2026 pending regulatory approvals, will consolidate Euronet's standing in Greek merchant services by merging with CrediaBank's portfolio.
